name: Lucy (itch)
description:
Lucy is a simple and hard  runner game where your color should be the same as colorful obstacles otherwise you'll be destroyed.

How to play

Press A and D to change your own color and press Up Arrow to jump

Game Features:

  • 28 Stages
  • 7 Unique Soundtracks
  • 7 Unlockable Zones
  • 2 Game Modes
  • HD Graphics
